scenario_text.value: Where would there be food?
What? Did you hear that?
Did you hear that, Aoi?

I did. It sounded like someone was turning
off a water faucet...

Oh, it’s you guys...
What’re you doing here?
Haru? Is that you?!
It’s Haru!

Haru, did you just use the water faucet over
there?
Yes. Why, shouldn’t I?
Is there water?
What? It comes out like it always does.
Which means...we have plumbing?!

That was easy!
We have water, all of a sudden!
(Aoi seems a bit deflated.)
Try to be happy here.
Kinda weird, huh?

Well, we met one of our goals, so let’s be
happy about that for now.

Okay, sure...
Drinking water is important.
We have running water, and that’s incredible.

Weird, huh? The walls and floors are a mess,
everything looks abandoned, but water?

Now that I think about it, none of the sheets
or blankets showed any wear or mildew...

Is someone maintaining everything?
But it all seems so worn down...

It’s all good.
We needed this lifeline.

Maybe that means there’s more useful stuff
inside this building!
Anyway, let’s keep looking.
